name: Into the Catacombs (JollyCoopCo)
description:
Into the Catacombs is a two-player cooperative stealth puzzler where players must work together to infiltrate a heavily guarded pyramid.

Taking place in ancient Egypt, a peaceful society of cat people has been invaded by roman rats led by the wicked tyrant, Julius Cheesar. In order to rescue baby kittens that have been taken purrisoner, two courageous cats must sneak past rat guards and solve the pyramid’s puzzles as they go deeper…into the catacombs.

Set-up: Both players must join the same lobby by entering the lobby name after clicking "start" in the main menu

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, shift to sneak, space to dash, and M to meow!

Developed by JollyCoopCo! Meet the team below!

Product Owner/AI and Gameplay Programmer - Daniel VanRyn

Networking Programmer - Pat Fagan

Organizational Designer - Talyn Xystus

Level and Audio Designer - Michael St Louis

Rigging and Animation Artist - Alisha Bernadin

Concept and Character Artist - Alexis Sophabmixay

UI/UX and Props Artist - Alina Coffey

Lead Producer - Kendrick Ng-Yow

If you enjoyed the game, please consider following JollyCoopCo for updates and add a comment below!
